title: 820-2915 missing backlight
message:
im working on a liquid damaged 820-2915 that after UC powers on and boots into os but with no backlight. liquid damage was around u9701 i replaced the chip but noticed that there was a missing pad on ball 5 ( PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT_FB). i went to run a wire to the chip but cant seem to find wx9720 to run it to.  im thinking the boardview is not correct as it says this chip is located under c9797.

can anyone verify the location of this WX9720?

title: 820-2915 missing backlight
message: It is inside the board. Run the wire to the diode, I don't think there is a closer point.

title: 820-2915 missing backlight
message: ok thanks. ill give that a try.
